page.title: 08Banff Primary School
page.content: I am a pupil in Banff Primary School. Our school is an old building and is situated on a hill to the west of the town.Below us is a car park to which the school buses bring pupils who live far away. The building that we use was first built in 1849. It has been used for a museum, a school for the mentally handicapped and was also used as Banff Academy at one time.The school is in two blocks: there is a lower block with primaries 1-3 in it and a higher block with primaries 4-7 in it.We do not have playing fields at our school ; instead we have to go down the hill to Duff House playing fields.The school has a front sloped garden where, in summer, you can sit out and do your work. I enjoy being at my school because there us a nice atmosphere.
